title: Grilled Chicken & Quinoa Power Bowl
summary: High-protein power bowl with lean chicken and nutrient-rich quinoa.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Season chicken with herbs, salt, and pepper.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a grill pan over medium-high heat.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Steam broccoli until tender, about 5 minutes.
Whisk remaining oil with lemon juice and garlic for dressing.
Slice chicken and arrange over quinoa in bowls.
Add broccoli and avocado slices.
Drizzle with dressing and top with pumpkin seeds.

title: Salmon & Lentil Protein Bowl
summary: Omega-3 rich salmon paired with protein-packed lentils.
instructions: Cook lentils in vegetable broth for 15 minutes until tender.
Season salmon with paprika, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan and cook salmon for 4 minutes per side.
Drain lentils and mix with half the lemon juice.
Combine yogurt with dill and remaining lemon juice.
Serve salmon over lentils.
Top with diced cucumber and yogurt sauce.
Finish with a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Greek Yogurt Protein Parfait
summary: Protein-rich parfait perfect for breakfast or post-workout snack.
instructions: Mix Greek yogurt with protein powder until smooth.
Layer half the yogurt mixture in a glass or bowl.
Add half the berries and a sprinkle of granola.
Add remaining yogurt mixture.
Top with remaining berries, granola, and crushed almonds.
Drizzle with almond butter and honey.
Sprinkle with chia seeds before serving.

title: Turkey Meatball Power Plate
summary: Lean turkey meatballs with vegetables and whole grains.
instructions: Mix turkey, egg, breadcrumbs, garlic, and half the onion.
Season with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Form into 12 meatballs.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Cook meatballs for 12-15 minutes, turning occasionally.
Steam green beans until tender, about 6 minutes.
Serve meatballs over brown rice with green beans.
Garnish with remaining fresh onion if desired.

title: Protein-Packed Tofu Scramble
summary: High-protein vegan scramble with tofu and nutritional yeast.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Sauté onion and pepper for 5 minutes until soft.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add crumbled tofu, turmeric, and nutritional yeast.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add plant milk and cook until absorbed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve topped with hemp seeds and fresh herbs.
